title: The Alchemist
author: Paulo Coelho
description: A philosophical tale about following one’s dreams and destiny, through the journey of a young shepherd named Santiago.

title: Atomic Habits
author: James Clear
description: A guide to building good habits and breaking bad ones using the science of behavior change.

title: Rich Dad Poor Dad
author: Robert Kiyosaki
description: A personal finance classic contrasting the mindset of the author’s ‘rich dad’ and ‘poor dad’.

title: Think and Grow Rich
author: Napoleon Hill
description: One of the best-selling books of all time about achieving success through visualization and persistence.

title: Deep Work
author: Cal Newport
description: Explores the benefits of deep, focused work and strategies to master it in a distracted world.

title: Ikigai
author: Héctor García and Francesc Miralles
description: Explores the Japanese concept of Ikigai — a reason for being, blending purpose, longevity, and happiness.
